Investor_0.name: Liam OConnor
Investor_0.content: Following the rejection of the allocation plan presented by Robert Miller, my cautious and analytical approach to investment has been reinforced. While the proposed allocation of 70% to myself and 30% to him seemed fair on surface, his track record marked by low reputation raised significant concerns around transparency and equity. Consequently, I've strengthened my resolve to thoroughly vet potential trustees before engaging, maintaining an overall reputation of being wary and meticulous in my investment decisions.

Such behavior undermines her credibility and trustworthiness, and it raises questions about her integrity in future dealings.

This pattern of rejections shows that I need a strategic overhaul in my approach to align better with investor expectations and enhance my credibility. I must focus on creating more transparent and equitable allocation plans to foster trust among prospective investors.
